00061 class c_ground_wave
00062 {
00063 public:
00064         /* common  /gwav/ */
00065         nec_float r1, r2, zmh, zph;
00066         nec_complex u, u2, xx1, xx2;
00067         
00068         void set_u(nec_complex in_u)
00069         {
00070                 u = in_u;
00071                 u2 = u * u;
00072         }
00073 };
